00030 #import "SBJsonWriter.h"
00031 
00032 @interface SBJsonWriter ()
00033 
00034 - (BOOL)appendValue:(id)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json;
00035 - (BOOL)appendArray:(NSArray*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json;
00036 - (BOOL)appendDictionary:(NSDictionary*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json;
00037 - (BOOL)appendString:(NSString*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json;
00038 
00039 - (NSString*)indent;
00040 
00041 @end
00042 
00043 @implementation SBJsonWriter
00044 
00045 @synthesize sortKeys;
00046 @synthesize humanReadable;
00047 
00052 - (NSString*)stringWithFragment:(id)value {
00053     [self clearErrorTrace];
00054     depth = 0;
00055     NSMutableString *json = [NSMutableString stringWithCapacity:128];
00056     
00057     if ([self appendValue:value into:json])
00058         return json;
00059     
00060     return nil;
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 - (NSString*)stringWithObject:(id)value {
00065     
00066     if ([value isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class]] || [value isKindOfClass:[NSArray class]]) {
00067         return [self stringWithFragment:value];
00068     }
00069 
00070     [self clearErrorTrace];
00071     [self addErrorWithCode:EFRAGMENT description:@"Not valid type for JSON"];
00072     return nil;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 - (NSString*)indent {
00077     return [@"\n" stringByPaddingToLength:1 + 2 * depth withString:@" " startingAtIndex:0];
00078 }
00079 
00080 - (BOOL)appendValue:(id)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json {
00081     if ([fragment isKindOfClass:[NSDictionary class]]) {
00082         if (![self appendDictionary:fragment into:json])
00083             return NO;
00084         
00085     } else if ([fragment isKindOfClass:[NSArray class]]) {
00086         if (![self appendArray:fragment into:json])
00087             return NO;
00088         
00089     } else if ([fragment isKindOfClass:[NSString class]]) {
00090         if (![self appendString:fragment into:json])
00091             return NO;
00092         
00093     } else if ([fragment isKindOfClass:[NSNumber class]]) {
00094         if ('c' == *[fragment objCType])
00095             [json appendString:[fragment boolValue] ? @"true" : @"false"];
00096         else
00097             [json appendString:[fragment stringValue]];
00098         
00099     } else if ([fragment isKindOfClass:[NSNull class]]) {
00100         [json appendString:@"null"];
00101     } else if ([fragment respondsToSelector:@selector(proxyForJson)]) {
00102         [self appendValue:[fragment proxyForJson] into:json];
00103         
00104     } else {
00105         [self addErrorWithCode:EUNSUPPORTED description:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"JSON serialisation not supported for %@", [fragment class]]];
00106         return NO;
00107     }
00108     return YES;
00109 }
00110 
00111 - (BOOL)appendArray:(NSArray*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json {
00112     if (maxDepth && ++depth > maxDepth) {
00113         [self addErrorWithCode:EDEPTH description: @"Nested too deep"];
00114         return NO;
00115     }
00116     [json appendString:@"["];
00117     
00118     BOOL addComma = NO;    
00119     for (id value in fragment) {
00120         if (addComma)
00121             [json appendString:@","];
00122         else
00123             addComma = YES;
00124         
00125         if ([self humanReadable])
00126             [json appendString:[self indent]];
00127         
00128         if (![self appendValue:value into:json]) {
00129             return NO;
00130         }
00131     }
00132     
00133     depth--;
00134     if ([self humanReadable] && [fragment count])
00135         [json appendString:[self indent]];
00136     [json appendString:@"]"];
00137     return YES;
00138 }
00139 
00140 - (BOOL)appendDictionary:(NSDictionary*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json {
00141     if (maxDepth && ++depth > maxDepth) {
00142         [self addErrorWithCode:EDEPTH description: @"Nested too deep"];
00143         return NO;
00144     }
00145     [json appendString:@"{"];
00146     
00147     NSString *colon = [self humanReadable] ? @" : " : @":";
00148     BOOL addComma = NO;
00149     NSArray *keys = [fragment allKeys];
00150     if (self.sortKeys)
00151         keys = [keys sortedArrayUsingSelector:@selector(compare:)];
00152     
00153     for (id value in keys) {
00154         if (addComma)
00155             [json appendString:@","];
00156         else
00157             addComma = YES;
00158         
00159         if ([self humanReadable])
00160             [json appendString:[self indent]];
00161         
00162         if (![value isKindOfClass:[NSString class]]) {
00163             [self addErrorWithCode:EUNSUPPORTED description: @"JSON object key must be string"];
00164             return NO;
00165         }
00166         
00167         if (![self appendString:value into:json])
00168             return NO;
00169         
00170         [json appendString:colon];
00171         if (![self appendValue:[fragment objectForKey:value] into:json]) {
00172             [self addErrorWithCode:EUNSUPPORTED description:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"Unsupported value for key %@ in object", value]];
00173             return NO;
00174         }
00175     }
00176     
00177     depth--;
00178     if ([self humanReadable] && [fragment count])
00179         [json appendString:[self indent]];
00180     [json appendString:@"}"];
00181     return YES;    
00182 }
00183 
00184 - (BOOL)appendString:(NSString*)fragment into:(NSMutableString*)json {
00185     
00186     static NSMutableCharacterSet *kEscapeChars;
00187     if( ! kEscapeChars ) {
00188         kEscapeChars = [[NSMutableCharacterSet characterSetWithRange: NSMakeRange(0,32)] retain];
00189         [kEscapeChars addCharactersInString: @"\"\\"];
00190     }
00191     
00192     [json appendString:@"\""];
00193     
00194     NSRange esc = [fragment rangeOfCharacterFromSet:kEscapeChars];
00195     if ( !esc.length ) {
00196         // No special chars -- can just add the raw string:
00197         [json appendString:fragment];
00198         
00199     } else {
00200         NSUInteger length = [fragment length];
00201         for (NSUInteger i = 0; i < length; i++) {
00202             unichar uc = [fragment characterAtIndex:i];
00203             switch (uc) {
00204                 case '"':   [json appendString:@"\\\""];       break;
00205                 case '\\':  [json appendString:@"\\\\"];       break;
00206                 case '\t':  [json appendString:@"\\t"];        break;
00207                 case '\n':  [json appendString:@"\\n"];        break;
00208                 case '\r':  [json appendString:@"\\r"];        break;
00209                 case '\b':  [json appendString:@"\\b"];        break;
00210                 case '\f':  [json appendString:@"\\f"];        break;
00211                 default:    
00212                     if (uc < 0x20) {
00213                         [json appendFormat:@"\\u%04x", uc];
00214                     } else {
00215                         CFStringAppendCharacters((CFMutableStringRef)json, &uc, 1);
00216                     }
00217                     break;
00218                     
00219             }
00220         }
00221     }
00222     
00223     [json appendString:@"\""];
00224     return YES;
00225 }

00228 @end
